name: Glaring Palace
description:
It's 2509. An era has closed: mankinds first attempt to colonise Venus was a failure.

Space station Elliot 9 is now on it's way to our nearest planetary neighbour to provide it's last residents a safe new home.

The two-person crew expected to have an uneventful journey but that soon changes after they recieve a strange distress signal.

CREDITS

Glaring Palace is created by Attila Rácz. This is my first-ever game. Your opinion is highly appreciated. Enjoy! :)
